body.p: Using a file explorer, go to the /frameworks directory. Select the sdf directory and make an archive from it. Move it to another installation (eventually on another computer). Extract it in the /frameworks directory. Start and test the association as explained above.

When deploying your customized sdf directory, make sure that your sdf directory contains the sdf.framework file (that is the file defined as External Storage in the shall always be stored inside the sdf directory). If your external storage points somewhere else will not be able to update the Document Type Association options automatically on the deployed computers.
